channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My aunts survived the Holocaust. Now, we must do more than say 'never again.' | Opinion
Indian PM vows to 'track, and punish every terrorist and their backers' of Kashmir attack
OUCH! Fox News Viewers Get An Uncomfortable Truth About Trump On Live TV
China pushes for tariff cancellation to end US trade war
Alabama to execute a man who said he's guilty of rape and murder and deserves to die
3/20: CBS Morning News
item.description: President Trump to sign executive order to begin dismantling the Department of Education; Conservative environmental activist launches "Nature is Nonp...

item.title: TikTok astrologer arrested for predicting big quake, spreading panic
item.description: John Moe The, who has a TikTok following of more than 300,000, forecast that a "very strong" quake would hit "every city in Myanmar."

item.title: Warren probing impact on students, teachers from Education Dept. cuts
item.description: She says she wants to hear from those directly "hurt by Trump's dangerous agenda."

item.title: India retaliates against Pakistan after Kashmir attack kills 26
item.description: India's External Affairs Ministry said the Indus Water Treaty will be suspended after an attack in Kashmir left over two dozen dead.

item.title: Trump's meme coin surges after offer of dinner with the president
item.description: President Trump's meme coin had lost 88% of its value. But an offer of dinner with the president helped boost its price on Wednesday.

item.title: Gunmen torch vehicles across Mexico as cartel turf war rages
item.description: The Jalisco New Generation cartel was designated a terrorist organization by U.S. President Donald Trump in February.

item.title: China says there are no negotiations with the US over tariffs
item.description: China has denied U_S_ President Donald Trump’s assertion that the two sides were involved in active negotiations over tariffs, saying that any suggest...

item.title: Most Americans expect higher prices as a result of Trump’s tariffs, a new AP-NORC poll finds
item.description: A new AP-NORC poll suggests Americans’ trust in President Donald Trump to bolster the U.S. economy appears to be faltering.

item.title: WATCH: Fisherman finds historic artifacts using high-powered magnet
item.description: Evan Woodward, founder of Baltimore’s Magnet Fishing Club, combines his archaeological hobby with the mission of cleaning up his hometown.

item.title: New York City region air quality alert as New Jersey wildfire burns 13,000 acres
item.description: At least 13,000 acres are burning in New Jersey as winds are expected to continue Thursday and smoke will hit the New York City area.

item.title: From banning tech to ending sister-city ties, US states have at least 240 anti-China proposals
Trump tariffs live updates: Trump softens tone on China
item.description: A poll from the Pew Research Center found that a majority of Americans disapprove of some of the second Trump administration’s key economic actions.

item.title: Head of NAACP disinvited from speaking to Texas state bar over suit against Trump administration
